name: Brotherton Construction Co., Appellant, v. Patterson-Emerson-Comstock, Inc.
name_abbreviation: Brotherton Construction Co. v. Patterson-Emerson-Comstock, Inc.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
parties: Brotherton Construction Co., Appellant, v. Patterson-Emerson-Comstock, Inc.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Musmanno,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the able opinion of Judge Lichteneeld of the Court of Common Pleas of Chester County.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Musmanno,

attorneys: G. Clinton Fogwell, Jr., with Mm Lawrence E. Wood, and Reilly, Fogwell & Lentz, for appellant.
George J. McConehie, with Mm W. Edward Greenwood, and Hodge, Hodge & Cramp, and Gawthrop & Greenwood, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Brotherton Construction Co., Appellant, v. Patterson-Emerson-Comstock, Inc.
Argued January 15, 1962.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
G. Clinton Fogwell, Jr., with Mm Lawrence E. Wood, and Reilly, Fogwell & Lentz, for appellant.
George J. McConehie, with Mm W. Edward Greenwood, and Hodge, Hodge & Cramp, and Gawthrop & Greenwood, for appellee.
March 13, 1962:
